abilities.description: Roots all enemies in a target 375 radius for 2 seconds and deals 180 damage.
Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 160 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
300 mana, 1.25 mana regeneration and 2.5% flat base magic resistance.
17.5 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Gleipnir
description: Bindings forged by impossible means to leash an ancient evil.
trivia: In Norse Mythology, Gleipnir is the chain that is used to bind Fenrir, a wolf that is the son of Loki and Angrboda.
Gleipnir's intern name is "Gungir", an incorrect spelling of Gungnir, which is the spear of the Norse Mythology God Odin.
tips: Gleipnir is a very important item to buy for heroes who either have no area-of-effect abilities or strong disables on their own, as it will allow them to gain some advantage over their weaknesses.

Gleipnir's passive chain lighting is useful against heroes who rely on summons and illusions to be effective: Terrorblade. Phantom Lancer, Chaos Knight, Naga Siren, Broodmother, Visage, Lycan, Wraith King, Warlock, Nature's Prophet.

Active ability of Gleipnir is very good against heroes who rely on movement-themed abilities to survive: Phantom Assassin, Anti-Mage, Slark, Magnus, Windranger, Lycan, Hoodwink, Phantom Lancer, Void Spirit, Earth Spirit, Ember Spirit, Storm Spirit, Centaur Warrunner, Spirit Breaker.

If they are struck by it's active ability, invisible heroes will become revealed by Gleipnir, making this item very effective against heroes who rely on invisiblity to gain advantage: Riki, Bounty Hunter, Nyx Assassin, Templar Assassin, Slark, Sand King.

Gleipnir's ability to root multiple enemy heroes makes this item very good against heroes who rely on Blink Dagger to be effective: Tinker, Rubick, Earthshaker, Enigma, Magnus, Tidehunter, Templar Assassin, Pudge, Tiny, Batrider, Sand King, Meepo, Axe, Centaur Warrunner.
Like against Blink Dagger, Gleipnir is also useful against heroes who rely on Silver Edge to be effective: Spirit Breaker, Slark, Earthshaker, Kunkka, Drow Ranger, Dragon Knight.
Gleipnir can be combined with Dust of Appearance to guarantee that invisible heroes will be revealed.
Remember that Gleipnir can be easily dispelled by many abilities and items, so you should wait for enemy heroes to spend all of their dispels before engaging with Gleipnir.
